Html:
Hi Laurent,

I really need the documentation of MVVM Light. When you will decide to publish it please?

Best regards,

Maher Jendoubi.

Hi Maher

I agree that the documentation is some what limited, I had similar issues when I first started using the toolkit. I watched the two superb MIX talks (linked to on the projects homepage) and they answered the majority of my questions.

I hope this helps

Phil
